messages.content: How can I use Pilgram2 filters in ComfyUI?
The provided text suggests that you can use Pilgram2 filters in ComfyUI by utilizing the information available at the given GitHub repository: [Pilgram2](https://github.com/mgineer85/pilgram2).
Where can I find examples of using Pilgram2 filters in ComfyUI?
The text includes an image with a link to a set of Pilgram2 filter samples: ![samples](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mgrl/pilgram2/main/screenshots/screenshot.png).
